ygData.subject: Re: Arming pets...
ygData.msgSnippet: I havent heard whether Necro pets can dual wield or not but i wouldnt be surprised. My Necro friends 16th level pet is a maniac :) give that naughty little boy
ygData.messageBody:
I havent heard whether Necro pets can dual wield or not but i wouldnt
be surprised.
My Necro friends 16th level pet is a maniac :) give that naughty little
boy a rusty morning star and he's hitting for 20 ponts of damage and
literally soloed 4 gnoll shamans in Paw.

But whether we ever see a dual wielding pet is highly doubtfull.

Give yours a rusty 2H sword or scythe and he'll do a nice 16 or so
points of damage per hit.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
